name: Displacement
description:
Displacement: can you master gravity and align with your destiny?

How to play:

Use L/R arrow keys to move, and U/D arrow keys to change veloctiy

Dodge the oncoming walls and see if you can gain a highscore!


This is a game made in #pico8 for the #KSUGameJam

Theme: Left Behind

https://twitter.com/Rogue_BaronMC
